Oracle Corporation ( ORCL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on January 03, 2017. A cash dividend payment of $0.15 per share is scheduled to be paid on January 26, 2017. Shareholders who purchased ORCL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 8th quarter that ORCL has paid the same dividend.

The previous trading day's last sale of ORCL was $38.69, representing a -7.88% decrease from the 52 week high of $42 and a 16.78% increase over the 52 week low of $33.13.

ORCL is a part of the Technology sector, which includes companies such as Microsoft Corporation ( MSFT ) and SAP SE ( SAP ). ORCL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $2.07. Zacks Investment Research reports ORCL's forecasted earnings growth in 2017 as -2.88%, compared to an industry average of 3.8%.

For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the ORCL Dividend History page. Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
